Game: Eco Creatures- Save the Forest 2007-08-23T00:00:00-07:00 Eco Creatures: Save the Forest, known as Ecolis (????, Ekorisu) in Japan and as Ecolis: Save the Forest in Europe, is a real-time strategy video game for the Nintendo DS video game console. It was co-developed by LightWeight and Headlock Corporation and was released in Japan on August 23, 2007 by Interchannel; in North America on March 4, 2008 by Majesco Entertainment; and in Europe on June 13, 2008 by Rising Star Games. Eco Creatures is sponsored by the World Wide Fund for Nature. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/9e7c620a-9b5c-48fc-8cf1-4e6a22335575.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/8217e7d5-0620-4fec-a90f-e6dc715ef785.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/7de85950-8e24-4dce-b792-f421ceb7d5d8.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eco_Creatures:_Save_the_Forest E - Everyone LightWeight Interchannel
